name: OverClaw Gateway Architecture
description: Gateway provides REST API for agent management, mail, approval flow, and dashboard UI on separate port 5050
ENOENT mulch.config.yaml when mulch learn runs in agent worktrees that lack .mulch directory
resolution: Guard the stop hook with three checks: command -v mulch, test -f .mulch/mulch.config.yaml, and OVERSTORY_AGENT_NAME / worktree path detection

title: Use mulch for agent expertise persistence
rationale: Agents wake up fresh each session; mulch provides structured, queryable expertise records that survive across sessions and can be scoped per domain
